prerequisites.supportedUseCase:
Shows users across different environments/accounts, admin users, and shared/system user accounts.

Within the Admin Users widget an additional query to find users that are assigned to roles which are tied to administrative IAM access policies is included. This is in addition to the first query that is finding users who are deemed to be administrators based on the type/role attribute directly on the user.

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find User as u
Return
  u.tag.AccountName as name,
  count(u) as value

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find User as u that !is Person
  return u.tag.AccountName, u._type, u.displayName, u.username, u.email
  order by u.tag.AccountName

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find User with admin=true 
Return User.tag.AccountName as Account, 
  User._type, User.displayName, User.email

queries.name: query2
queries.query:
Find User that ASSIGNED AccessRole that ASSIGNED AccessPolicy with admin = true
Return AccessRole.tag.AccountName as Account, 
  User._type, User.displayName, User.email
